body_html:
Hi I believe I had the same error, cmake bat file looked like so:
cd "C:\Users\Cameron\Desktop\tensorflow\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build"
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/swigwin-3.0.10/swig.exe ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/Python35/python.exe ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/Python35/libs/python35.lib ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
-DCUDNN_HOME=C:/cuda

body:
Hi I believe I had the same error, cmake bat file looked like so:
cd "C:\Users\Cameron\Desktop\tensorflow\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build"
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/swigwin-3.0.10/swig.exe ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/Python35/python.exe ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/Python35/libs/python35.lib ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
-DCUDNN_HOME=C:/cuda
